reviewText: I saw this movie in the theater and LOVED it... had to buy it and one extra for my church...It's such an eye opener!! Everyone should watch this movie!
Great DVD
Couldn't watch it, it didn't work in my DVD player.

Awesome movie! Juan Manuel Cotelo with Infinito Mas Uno did a fantastic job! PRAISE GOD!

St. Pope John Paul II describes the situation we are now in as that there are  entire groups of the baptized have lost a living sense of the faith, or even no longer consider themselves members of the Church, and live a life far removed from Christ and his Gospel. In this case what is needed is a new evangelization or a re-evangelization. THIS MOVIE DOES FULFILL THAT NEED! SHARE WITH YOUR FAMILY AND FRIENDS TO BE APART OF THAT NEW EVANGELIZATION!!
Love this movie, it shows how the Virgen Mary still to this day is making herself present in our lives. Showed several conversion stories. Touching not at all corny

recommend this movie, it's a great message to get closer to the Virgin and Jesus Christ and becomes much easier to understand many things from the Bible.
I really liked and I intend to show to all who can give the message.
Excelent Movie, loved it  and shared it with others.
Fast shipping ! great and touching Movie
Nice plot, fun movie, hey Protestants! If you don't get Mary then start with this movie.
Great movie! Funny as well as spiritual.  I went to Medjugorje 21 years ago and it brought back a lot of memories.
Good documentary! it's really a deep christian matter.

This movie changed my life! Beautiful conversion stories are told throughout the movie. This was the first time I heard about Medjugorje. I was introduced to what has been going on in Bosnia for over 35 years and the messages the Blessed Virgin Mary has been sharing with us. My life has not been the same since I watched this film.
The best movie I have ever seen!!!
Loved it
Awesome movie, I really recommend it

I really enjoyed this movie. Half of it is in Spanish, but you can put the English subtitles on, and the other half is in English. I can picture this being shown in a Catholic high school setting in Spanish class or Religion class, as well as being shown to a high school youth group or college young adult group as a reflection before confessions.
Received as described
This was truly a beautiful movie that I enjoyed watching and the realities that are going on!
very good movie

It is the third time I purchase this movie; I will continue to buy this movie, makes a great gift.

Most beautiful movie ever. 100% recommended for watching the whole family together.

Great movie! In this DVD version you learn a lot from Dir. Juan Manuel Cotelo in the Extras! After watching the movie and the extras, we feel we wanna follow Doctor John Bruchalski's recommendations: "Go to Medjugorje!,""open your heart!"

This film was awesome!! My family and I loved the way the director shot the movie..gave many perspectives!! There were moments of humor in the midst of dealing with a subject that is difficult and for some ...painful.  Well done movie...BRAVO!!

MUST SEE MOVIE.  Infinito +1 did it again.  Juan Manuel Cotello and his group of "Locomotoras" bring us a great movie with Fantastic Visuals and a story line that lead us and other people to understand the Marian devotion in the Catholic Church.
Excelente movie...
this is one of the best documentaries on the effects of Medjugorje and on the lives of people who have gone there.  very good.  about half of the documentary is in Spanish with English subtitles.
